thread.title: ‘Skin to Skin’ song stimulates me during sex - Stonebwoy reveals
thread.title_full: ‘Skin to Skin’ song stimulates me during sex - Stonebwoy reveals

title: ‘Skin to Skin’ song stimulates me during sex - Stonebwoy reveals
text:
Source: Ghana | Hitz FM | Anita Ampomah Date: 20-10-2015 Time: 05:10:55:pm Stonebwoy 
Award winning Ghanaian dancehall artiste, Stonebwoy, known in real life as Livingstone Etse Setekla has disclosed the song he plays whilst making love. 
According to the artiste, there are a lot of his songs that will stimulate the act of sex but he will pick his ‘Skin to Skin’ song. 
Stonebwoy made the revelation during an interview with Dr Pounds on the ‘Hitz High Table’ show on Hitz FM. 
He said, “I think I have a lot of songs that inspire the emotion but I think I will play ‘Skin to Skin’.” 
The reigning Artiste of the Year at the Ghana Music Awards continued that, playing the wrong song at that particular time can destroy the mood. 
“There is a song [that describes] the thing itself… so if you play a different song, you [mess] it up,” he continued. 
The ‘Go Higher’ hit maker added that contrary to perceptions by some ladies that he is not romantic due to the kind of songs he records; he is very romantic. 
“Some girls may think I am not romantic but I am,” he added.
